reference.title: cxxFile module
reference.shortdesc: The cxxFile module defines a top-level container for all the elements necessary to describe an API declared at the global scope.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFile> topic type contains elements necessary to show the name of the file, and also the global variables, functions, preprocessor directives,, enumerations and typedefs contained within.
The cxxFile topic contains the following elements:
